amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 116-395 to require the GAO conduct a study on how the preservation of wilderness lands can help reduce the risk of flooding in residential areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 116-395 to require the GAO conduct a study on how the preservation of wilderness lands can help reduce the risk of flooding in residential areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Schrier.
